page.title: 17GOLF CLUB,SANDIWAY
page.content: The course is built on sand so in hot weather it is watered all the time. It is 63 years old with 18 holes and 69 bunkers. It is 6350 yards long, covering 150 acres. The course originally went right up to the single carriage road but a compulsary purchase order was issued to allow the building of the dual carriageway. To replace the 3 holes lost, land was bought from local industry. Any people over the age of 12 can join but at the moment there are no more places for male members. There are very good facilities including a bar, changing rooms and lounges in the club-house, but you have to be a member to use these. None of the rooms can be hired by the public. The course only has a club license. The price is different according to age.
